TopicTitle: What is the mod that corrects parts positions in the editor?

Articles.Content:
There was a mod I had installed (it came with another mod so I don't know the name) that corrected parts locations, like, it made easier to connect one wing to another

I don't know how to explain honestly, but I just know it makes it easier to build 

 

Edit: or was it a in-game setting? because for someone all my game settings reseted when I removed my mods

Edited September 25, 2020 by Neil Kermstrong

"found" it. It actually wasn't a mod, but a function on the game itself.

It's the "toggle snap angle/height" thing, in my keybind it's N, but i don't know about the default one.
